forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High around 50F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High around 10C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 39F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 4C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 54F. Winds ENE at 10 to 20 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 12C. Winds ENE at 15 to 30 km/h.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 47F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 58F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some evening light rain. Low 52F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some evening light rain. Low 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext: Windy and becoming cloudy in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds WSW at 20 to 30 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with increasing clouds. High 12C. Winds WSW at 30 to 50 km/h.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. Cloudy skies will become partly cloudy overnight. Low 42F. Winds W at 20 to 30 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low around 5C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 47F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 9C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 36F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 2C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 48F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 43F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 6C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 47F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 47F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 8C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 56F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low 47F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
